text:
While DOT/FHWA has authority to establish
certain regulations with respect to carriers of “migrant workers”, the Motor
Carrier Act specifically provides that the exemption under FLSA Sec 13(b)(1)
shall not extend to such carriers solely by virtue of such transportation. A
migrant worker is defined in that law as any individual proceeding to or
returning from employment in agriculture as defined in FLSA Sec 3(f).
